# Information Centre

Please find some useful information below;  [![](http://www.iconenergy.com.au//irm/showmedia.aspx?MediaId=42)](http://www.appea.com.au/select-committee-on-unconventional-gas-mining-submission-and-attachments/) |  [Senate Select Committee on Unconventional Gas Mining: APPEA submission and attachments ](http://www.appea.com.au/select-committee-on-unconventional-gas-mining-submission-and-attachments/)  
---|---
